Trade/Device Name(s): Merit Cultura™m Collection and Transport System
Merit Cultura™ Collection and Transport System
Specimen Container(s): Vial with 3.0 mL Viral Transport Medium (VTM)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx PCR System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Merit Cultura™ Collection and Transport System for collection and transport of clinical specimens for viral diagnostic assays, including SARS-CoV-2 and other respiratory viruses
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection and transport of clinical specimens to the laboratory for standard diagnostic/identification techniques for upper respiratory viral diagnostic assays including SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A/B, RSV, and Rhinovirus
